titles.title: POP Act
Patients Over Profit Act
POP Act
To prohibit health insurance issuers and certain health care providers under Medicare from being under common ownership, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
